Source code for itv_asset_tree.core.tree_prpoperty_manager


[docs]
class TreePropertyManager:
    """
    Handles applying properties to asset tree items.
    
    This class allows for modifying existing items in the asset tree by updating their properties
    based on provided metadata.
    """

    def __init__(self, tree):
        """
        Initializes the TreePropertyManager with a specified tree instance.

        Args:
            tree: The asset tree to which properties will be applied.
        """
        self.tree = tree



[docs]
    def apply_properties(self, metadata):
        """
        Applies properties to existing tree items based on provided metadata.

        Args:
            metadata (pd.DataFrame): A DataFrame containing metadata with property values.

        Raises:
            Exception: If there is an error during property application.
        """
        if metadata is None:
            print("‚ö†Ô∏è No metadata available to apply properties.")
            return

        try:
            for _, row in metadata.iterrows():
                item_name = row["Name"]
                properties = {col: row[col] for col in row.index if col not in ["Name", "Formula", "FormulaParams", "Parent"]}

                if properties:
                    print(f"üìå Applying properties to '{item_name}': {properties}")
                    self.tree.modify(item_name, properties=properties)

            self.tree.push()
            print("‚úÖ Properties applied and tree updated!")

        except Exception as e:
            print(f"‚ùå Error applying properties: {e}")
